tool_description: Easy to use multilingual deep learning translator. Translate between the main languages, JSON format.
name: do-translate
title: do-translate

api_list.name: Translate Text
api_list.description: This endpoint is used to translate a text.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://do-translate.p.rapidapi.com/trans/translate_string"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "do-translate.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
